description.ko: AQUA-5 시리즈는 지구에서 가장 깊은 미개척 심해를 탐험하며, 빛이 전혀 닿지 않는 미드나이트 존의 고요한 장엄함과 신비롭게 빛나는 생명체들을 담색합니다.
description.en: The AQUA-5 series explores the uncharted territories of the Earth's deepest oceans, capturing the silent majesty and glowing mysteries of the midnight zone where light never reaches.

prompt: Cinematic wide-angle shot of the deep ocean floor at the midnight zone, featuring mysterious bioluminescent marine life, hydrothermal vents releasing shimmering minerals, high-contrast lighting with deep teal and navy hues, ultra-realistic textures, 8k resolution, ethereal atmosphere, particles of sea snow floating in the water.
